title: During heated hearing, Rubio insists US action in Venezuela will lead to prosperity and security
summary_full: The US Secretary of State remained robustly on message when asked about the legality of Maduro's removal, plans for oil sales, and the future of Venezuela.
summary_public: The US Secretary of State remained robustly on message when asked about the legality of Maduro's removal, plans for oil sales, and the future of Venezuela.
